summary:
Lohrdaan has been lying here for centuries, in his tomb, waiting.
You can be the one to wake him up. But do you dare challenge him and his minions?

Rich loot awaits if you can tumble through the chambers so maybe it is worth the risk
descriptionHtml:
Lohrdaan has been lying here for centuries in his tomb, waiting.
You can be the one to wake him up. But do you dare challenge him and his minions?

Rich loot awaits if you can tumble through the chambers so maybe it is worth the risk.

A small place to discover for those with an adventurer kind of spirit.
Level 30-40 and up is recommended. :O)


Installing:

Just drop the file into your data folder or rely upon ModManager (NMM).


Incompatibilities:

The mod slightly modifies the landscape near one of the shrines on the road to High Hrothgar
but it does not spoil anything else. Hopefully. If it does, please report me (it shouldn\'t anyhow)

Dawnguard DLC is required.

Constructive comments and bug reports are always welcome! :O)
author: Lbukki
